name: Frostbitten Survival
description:
You're a survivor in a frosty apocalypse.

Kill the Grumbuses and Borghingis to unlock new allies and weaponry!

Controls

WASD - Move

Left Mouse - Attack with weapon

Right Mouse - Use special ability

Space - Use movement ability

Credits

Art - Sour

Programming - Sour & Szyfr

Music - Evan King
